Embedding plots in html

Tidyverse
```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

A dataframe
```{r}
plot_df=
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(100,mean=1,sd=2),
    y=1+2*x+rnorm(100)
  )
```

Plot here
```{r}
plot_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=x, y=y))+
  geom_point()
```
